custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) AND (DLFileVersion.name = DLFileEntry.name) WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileVersion.status = ?) AND [$FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (fileEntryId NOT IN( SELECT classPK FROM AssetEntry WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$] ))

( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) AND (DLFileVersion.name = DLFileEntry.name) WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileVersion.status = ?) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileShortcutId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileShortcut WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.status = 0) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] )

( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFolder WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) AND (DLFileVersion.name = DLFileEntry.name) WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileVersion.status = ?) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileShortcutId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileShortcut WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.status = 0) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] )

( SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.name AS name, title AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) AND (DLFileVersion.name = DLFileEntry.name) WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileVersion.status = ?) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT DISTINCT toFolderId AS modelFolderId, toName AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.folderId = DLFileShortcut.toFolderId) AND (DLFileEntry.name = DLFileShortcut.toName) WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.status = 0) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] ) ORDER BY modelFolder DESC, title ASC

( SELECT folderId AS modelFolderId, name AS name, name AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 1 AS modelFolder FROM DLFolder WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.name AS name, title AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) AND (DLFileVersion.name = DLFileEntry.name) WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileVersion.status = ?) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT DISTINCT toFolderId AS modelFolderId, toName AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.folderId = DLFileShortcut.toFolderId) AND (DLFileEntry.name = DLFileShortcut.toName) WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.status = 0) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] ) ORDER BY modelFolder DESC, title ASC
